channel.title: [P.I] Shop help
channel.description:
Well, I followed a snippit on how to add shops to Project Insanity, It was easy. It wasn't until I signed on and check that I noticed it requires points to buy items? I'm pretty sure I didn't miss anything out. If someone could help, I'll gladly give rep ++
My codes were as followed; Actionhandler.java [code] case 212: c.getShops().openShop(35); break;[/code]
shop.cfg. [code] shop = 35 Welfare_PVP 2 2 4151 1000[/code] [Note: Base was Optic-PKz]

item.title: [P.I] Shop help
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote="[J"]ava link=topic=467656.msg3419900#msg3419900 date=1291432577]
It’s none of that, the items aren’t in the special value.
I never received no errors either.

According to another site I asked, if I add any ID above 10 it converts it to points, anyway I can change this? I tried it and it was true. but at the same time, i want to keep the points.[/quote]

Try what I Vain I said

if (c.myShopId > 10) {

Read full topic

item.title: [P.I] Shop help
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

It’s none of that, the items aren’t in the special value.
I never received no errors either.

According to another site I asked, if I add any ID above 10 it converts it to points, anyway I can change this? I tried it and it was true. but at the same time, i want to keep the points.

Read full topic

item.title: [P.I] Shop help
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

Well,
I followed a snippit on how to add shops to Project Insanity, It was easy. It wasn’t until I signed on and check that I noticed it requires points to buy items? I’m pretty sure I didn’t miss anything out. If someone could help, I’ll gladly give rep ++

My codes were as followed;
Actionhandler.java

case 212: c.getShops().openShop(35); break;

shop.cfg.

shop = 35 Welfare_PVP 2 2 4151 1000
[Note: Base was Optic-PKz]

Read full topic
